org.anyframe.query.impl.jdbc.lob
Class Oracle8iLobHandler.OracleLobCreator

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.query.impl.jdbc.lob.Oracle8iLobHandler.OracleLobCreator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, LobCreator
Enclosing class:
Oracle8iLobHandler
protected class Oracle8iLobHandler.OracleLobCreator
extends Object
implements LobCreator

LobCreator implementation for Oracle databases. Creates Oracle-style temporary BLOBs and CLOBs that it frees on close.

See Also:
close()
